title: FizzBuzz
description:
Given an integer n, return a string array answer (1-indexed) where:

- answer[i] == 'FizzBuzz' if i is divisible by 3 and 5.
- answer[i] == 'Fizz' if i is divisible by 3.
- answer[i] == 'Buzz' if i is divisible by 5.
- answer[i] == i (as a string) if none of the above conditions are true.
hints: Use modulo operator % to check divisibility

testCases.explanation: 3 is divisible by 3, 5 is divisible by 5

title: Group Anagrams
description:
Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order.

An Anagram is a word or phrase formed by rearranging the letters of a different word or phrase, typically using all the original letters exactly once.
constraints:
1 <= strs.length <= 10^4
0 <= strs[i].length <= 100
strs[i] consists of lowercase English letters.
hints: Use a hash map to group anagrams
Sort each string as a key
Or use character frequency as key
